# HTTPDOWNLOAD Provider

The Http Download can be used to get resources from http server 

Use the navigation to the left to read about the available resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    httpdownload = {
      source = "sveba/httpdownload"
    }
  }
}
```
